Media coverage

Some recent articles, interviews, and other media and online discussions of CSER.

  1. “Humanity’s last invention and our uncertain future” Research News, University of Cambridge, 25 November 2012.
  2. “I robot, you soon to be extinct” Bryan Appleyard in The Sunday Times, 25 November 2012 (also accessible on Bryan Appleyard’s blog).
  3. “Cambridge to study technology’s risk to humans” Sylvia Hui, Associated Press, 25 November 2012.
  4. “Mega-risks that could drive us to extinction” New Scientist, 26 November 2012.
  5. “Rise of the Machines: Cambridge University to Study Technology’s ‘Existential Risk’ to Mankind” TIME Newsfeed, 29 November 2012.
  6. “Could robots soon add to mankind’s existential threats?” John Naughton in The Observer, 2 December 2012.
  7. Martin Rees on Night Waves, BBC Radio Three, 5 December 2012 (interview begins around 11:50).
  8. Huw Price on News Hour, BBC World Service, 25 November 2012 (interview begins around 44:00).
  9. “Doomsday preppers” Joshua Keating in Foreign Policy, 4 February 2013.
  10. Interview with Huw Price in CAM 68, March 2013. [Read online | PDF]
